honestly, the first part of this game is really boring, as you go through the most boring exposition of "earth sucks right now" and then go into the most basic and boring fps combat I've ever seen, but after Chapter 4, the game becomes much more fun ! I would tell you the reason, but I think you should give this game a try and find out why.

I picked broken doll and threw at military guard. They tased me afterwards. What a realistic game we have here...

Regardless, there's nothing positive to outline. Graphics are HORRENDEOUS and motion sickness was common occurance so devs should add bucket to system requirements. I can't imagine someone feeling healthy after session of this. Neither plot (woah, you resist authorative goverment!!) nor clunky combat are of any merit.
